bibl.title: Studies in Greek Encomiastic Poetry of the Early Byzantine Period.
bibl.seg: Viljamaa Toivo, Studies in Greek Encomiastic Poetry of the Early Byzantine Period. (Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 42, No. 4, 1968.)

C.R. par Giuseppe Giangrande, GGA 223 (1971) pp. 211-216 - Herbert Musurillo, CW 62 (1969) pp. 326-327 - W.F. Bakker, Mnemosyne 4e s., 26 (1973) pp. 200-201 - C.
